docs

Lure.js usage documentation

.init

	
var App = new lure( $('[x-view]') );
App.init();

.route


App.route('/home', {

	templateUrl: 'views/home.html',
	controller: 'HomeCtrl'

});

.controller


App.controller('link', 
function(scope, el, value) {

	$(el).on('click', function() {
		window.location.href = value;
	});	

});
